metadata.name: Guardian #1
metadata.description:
Stake Guardian to farm $STB on [StarBlock](https://starblockdao.io/nftfarming).   
Guardian is the AI project in the new world designed by 0xLady. Guardians are the last protection of 0xLady verse, fight and guard to offer better field. The world of the metaverse, where Guardians have superpowers and can be customized, also their smart screens allow Web3 to communicate faster.
